thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 66 of 625
thread.title: K. Merriweather

author: K. Merriweather
title: K. Merriweather
text: This site has an extensive selection of clothing. So many options to choose from and I like they try to recommend items based on my style. However, I wish the standard shipping option was faster. These days 2 day delivery is almost the norm. Also, I would recommend refreshing the website to remove the items that are no longer in stock. I spent a lot of time looking at items only to find out there were no sizes left. Just remove it from the site.
